page.title: 15A visit to the shops
page.content: I have been going shopping with my mum for quite a long time now. I go with her every Saturday, we go to Hadfield's and Petcher's which are local food stores. Some things have changed like the shops themselves. When I was younger they were quite different and a lot smaller but I still enjoy it even if things are not the same. They have more stocks of food now. When we go shopping we mostly buy bread, chocolate, crisps, potatoes,cabbage, tins of peas and a lot more. We walk to the shops, it takes us about 5 or 10 minutes. When we have got the food we put it in the shopping trolley and then into carrier bags.
